The parseScopes function joins a slice of scopes into a string. While this is not directly an injection risk, it could potentially be used to inject malicious data if the scope values are user-controlled.

The getCommonFetchOptions function extracts common fetch options based on the chosen command. While this is not directly an injection risk, it could potentially be used to inject malicious data if the command or options are user-controlled.

The getTimeDuration function generates a time duration based on a quantity and units. While this is not directly an injection risk, it could potentially be used to inject malicious data if the quantity or units are user-controlled.
